    • printStream

      public java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream printStream()
      Description copied from class: BaseListMenu
      Same as BaseMenu.printStream(), but outputs a different style of view. Most notably, the list items start at number 11, not 1.
      Overrides:
      printStream in class BaseListMenu
      Returns:
      A stream which can be converted to a string, this is what will be displayed on screen
